protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Axon Genepix Scanner (Genepix 4000B).

The GSE23617_SSN2_raw_data.txt data refer to the linear data which has been summarized using a summarization algorithm (RMA16, PLIER 16 and Iterative PLIER 16). All summarization algorithms also do variance stabilization by adding 16.The normalized data are generated after the log transformation and baseline transformation step.
3-week old npr1 sni1 and npr1 sni1 brca2a mutants were treated with 0.5 mM salicylic acid for 16 hours. Replicates are derived from three independent biological experiments.
Arabidopsis seedlings were grown at 21-24Â°C, 16-hour day length, 60% relative humidity
Total RNA was isolated from the frozen material using Qiagen Rneasy Plant Mini kit
RNA probes were labelled using the Ambion MessageAmp Premier.
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A).
GeneChips were scanned according to Affymetrix protocol.

The GSE23617_BRCA2A_raw_data.txt refer to the linear data which has been summarized using a summarization algorithm (RMA16, PLIER 16 and Iterative PLIER 16). All summarization algorithms also do variance stabilization by adding 16. The normalized data are generated after the log transformation and baseline transformation step.
3-week old npr1 sni1 brca2a mutants were treated with 0.5 mM salicylic acid for 16 hours.  Replicates are derived from two (SA treated) or three (water treated) independent biological experiments.
